key_points.point: Some reports of breaking after a few uses

verdict: Durability is generally perceived as good, but some users have reported issues with the suitcase breaking, indicating potential quality control inconsistencies. Sturdiness is also mentioned.

Storage capacity is generally viewed positively in terms of spaciousness, though some users have noted that the actual size/volume may be less than expected, and the lack of internal pockets is a drawback.
Concerns exist regarding the actual weight of the suitcase, with some users reporting it being higher than advertised. It's considered suitable for light travel
Maneuverability is generally considered a strong point, with users frequently praising the smooth-rolling wheels.
Material quality receives mixed reviews. While many acknowledge good quality, some desire better scratch resistance, implying it needs improvement. Some appreciate the Polypropylene material.
